function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Keywords related to death, isolation, and loneliness in the context of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues and social disconnection","Mitigation":"Provide access to mental health support and community engagement initiatives","Technologies":"Online mental health platforms, social media engagement tools","People":"Individuals experiencing loneliness and isolation","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Drastic reduction in Theme 1 (Community impact of loneliness) in Europe, corresponding with rise in Theme 3 (Mental health effect of loneliness)","Impact":"Shift in focus may lead to inadequate support for community impact of loneliness","Mitigation":"Reassess allocation of resources and support to address community impact of loneliness","Technologies":"Data analytics for trend monitoring, communication platforms for resource allocation","People":"Communities experiencing loneliness","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Variations in prevalence of themes over time, with minor fluctuations","Impact":"Inconsistent focus on key themes may lead to fragmented response and support","Mitigation":"Establish consistent monitoring and response protocols for each theme","Technologies":"Data analytics for trend monitoring, communication platforms for response coordination","People":"Public health organizations, community leaders","Owner":"Data analysts, public health authorities"}]}
